 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁד‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** apparently ==demon== (loan-word from Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šêdu***</u></abbr>, a protecting spirit, especially of bull-colossus, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Pa 153 f.</sup>; WB 645 [[BDB#COT|COT]]<sup>[[Deut.32.17|Deut 32:17]]</sup> [[BDB#Zim|Zim]]<sup>KAT3. 460 f.</sup>, 455, 649; compare Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שֵׁידָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***demon***, and (perhaps) Phoenician proper name <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גדשד‎</span> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xiii (1888), 481</sup> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>249</sup>; originally √<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוד‎</span> ( = Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***rule***) according to [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Bau|Baud]]<sup>Semitic Rei. i. 130 ff.</sup> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>WB</sup> and others; &gt; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (III, IV ***aid***, [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>ZMG xlvi (1892), 529, against this</sup> [[BDB#Zim|Zim]]<sup>l. c</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִזְבְּחוּ לַשֵּׁדִים לֹא אֱלֹהַּ‎</span> [[Deut.32.17|Deut 32:17]] (compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]), [[Ps.106.37|Ps 106:37]] (human sacrifice).
